text: Hey guys, i would be really glad to get an answer about my topic. Thank you so much!

Hey good folks, I am trying to upload a theme with custom fonts in a folder. However in the front, the cdn url gives me a cors issue. The fonts are imbued on the template so, I'd rather not make them a separate upload, if there is another way, as this will complicate the production quite a lot. Thanks
I usually do a filter and output on the page, {{blog_recent_posts('default', 1) | tojson}}
in a pre tag as well
